name: fmt

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

variants.name: cxxstd
variants.description: Use the specified C++ standard when building

description:
fmt (formerly cppformat) is an open-source formatting library. It can be
used as a safe alternative to printf or as a fast alternative to C++
IOStreams.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependent_to.name: model-traits
dependent_to.description: Model setup and querying in C++.

dependent_to.name: cracklib
dependent_to.description:
CrackLib tests passwords to determine whether they match certain
security-oriented characteristics, with the purpose of stopping users
from choosing passwords that are easy to guess.

dependent_to.name: rocsolver
dependent_to.description:
rocSOLVER is a work-in-progress implementation of a subset of LAPACK
functionality on the ROCm platform.

dependent_to.name: fairlogger
dependent_to.description: Lightweight and fast C++ Logging Library

dependent_to.name: bear
dependent_to.description:
Bear is a tool that generates a compilation database for clang tooling
from non-cmake build systems.

dependent_to.name: folly
dependent_to.description:
Folly (acronymed loosely after Facebook Open Source Library) is a
library of C++11 components designed with practicality and efficiency in
mind. Folly contains a variety of core library components used
extensively at Facebook. In particular, it's often a dependency of
Facebook's other open source C++ efforts and place where those projects
can share code.

dependent_to.name: ome-common-cpp
dependent_to.description:
Open Microscopy Environment: Common functionality for OME C++ libraries
and applications which is not readily available from the C++ Standard
Library. This includes basic portability functions, to wrapping other
libraries to make them usable with Modern C++ programming practices.

dependent_to.name: open3d
dependent_to.description: Open3D: A Modern Library for 3D Data Processing.

dependent_to.name: gitconddb
dependent_to.description:
Conditions Database library using a Git repository as the storage
backend

dependent_to.name: arbor
dependent_to.description:
Arbor is a high-performance library for computational neuroscience
simulations.

dependent_to.name: micromamba
dependent_to.description:
Mamba is a fast, robust, and cross-platform package manager (Miniconda
alternative). Micromamba is faster than Miniconda, and it is a
standalone executable, whereas Miniconda pulls in its own Python
environment.

dependent_to.name: pika-algorithms
dependent_to.description: C++ parallel algorithms built on pika.

dependent_to.name: palace
dependent_to.description: 3D finite element solver for computational electromagnetics

dependent_to.name: pajeng
dependent_to.description:
PajeNG is a re-implementation of the well-known Paje visualization tool
for the analysis of execution traces. PajeNG comprises the libpaje
library, and an auxiliary tool called pj_dump to transform Paje trace
files to Comma-Separated Value (CSV). The space-time visualization tool
called pajeng had been deprecated (removed from the sources) since
modern tools do a better job (see pj_gantt).

dependent_to.name: pika
dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallellism and concurrency.

dependent_to.name: gaudi
dependent_to.description: An experiment-independent HEP event data processing framework

dependent_to.name: spdlog
dependent_to.description: Very fast, header only, C++ logging library

dependent_to.name: seacas
dependent_to.description:
The SEACAS Project contains the Exodus and IOSS I/O libraries and a
collection of applications which create, query, modify, or translate
Exodus databases. Exodus is a finite element mesh and results database
file format. Default is to build the Exodus and IOSS libraries and the
io_shell, io_info, io_modify, struc_to_unstruc apps.

dependent_to.name: cantera
dependent_to.description:
Cantera is a suite of object-oriented software tools for problems
involving chemical kinetics, thermodynamics, and/or transport processes.
